alert.note: Alert for Greene; Oconee; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:33PM EST until January 13 at 1:36PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Penfield affecting Oglethorpe, Greene and Oconee Counties. Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson, Wilkinson and Washington Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Milledgeville affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Baldwin Counties. Oconee River at Avant Mine near Oconee affecting Wilkinson and Washington Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Penfield. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.6 feet and nearly steady. - Forecast...The river will rise to 20 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning to 10.7 feet and begin rising again early Sunday afternoon. It will rise to 10.8 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 945 AM EST.
